last_episode_to_air.name: Sane Enough
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Gacy's lawyers try to mount an insanity defense, police attempt the daunting, emotional task of identifying — and honoring — each of his victims.

name: Conversations with a Killer: The John Wayne Gacy Tapes
original_name: Conversations with a Killer: The John Wayne Gacy Tapes
overview: He dined with the powerful. He preyed on the vulnerable. Beneath a smiling exterior was the horrifying darkness of a sadistic serial killer.

seasons.name: Limited Series
seasons.overview: Never-before-heard audio from the interrogation of serial killer John Wayne Gacy threads through this chilling look at his 1970s murder spree.

episodes.name: The Life of the Party
episodes.overview: John Wayne Gacy becomes a prime suspect in teen Robert Piest’s disappearance. Previously unheard audio tapes reveal Gacy’s thoughts and early days.

episodes.name: A Nicely Kept Secret
episodes.overview: After a sprawling confession, Gacy starts acting erratically, forcing police to contend with both his behavior and a shifting investigation.

episodes.name: Sane Enough
episodes.overview: As Gacy's lawyers try to mount an insanity defense, police attempt the daunting, emotional task of identifying — and honoring — each of his victims.

1.name: Limited Series
